LOG.logging_format: 'simple' 'basis' 'detail' 'adap' : select log msg format by detail
LOG.logfile_savedir: '/path/to/your/log/files' : set directory to save log files
LOG.logfile_name: 'APP_NAME' : your app logfile's filename prefix ** MUST BE UNIQUE IN APPS
